entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 3:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: N 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
